C'est La Vie

Sep 21, 2014

shuiruge
  1. "Man is not born for enjoyment."
  2. The man who suffers much can understand more about life in itself.
  3. Life itself is not easy, as it shall be. C'est la vie.
  4. Yes, as it shall be. "C'est la vie." Words comes with breeze.
